privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content1: Welcome to Art3 Hub, a digital art platform designed to onboard visual artists into the world of digital creativity and NFTs. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform.
introduction.content2: Art3 Hub is operated by Escuela de Arte Nounish, a decentralized art school focused on teaching art and digital creativity to students and artists worldwide, with a special focus on the LATAM community.

personalInfo.title: 2.1 Personal Information
items: Email addresses when you create an account
Social media account information (Google, Instagram, Twitter) when you choose to connect them
Profile information you provide (name, bio, profile picture)
Wallet addresses when you connect your digital wallet

digitalArt.title: 2.2 Digital Art and NFT Data
items: Artwork files you upload to create NFTs
NFT metadata and collection information
Transaction history related to NFT creation and minting
Blockchain transaction data (publicly available on Base, Celo, and Zora networks)

usageInfo.title: 2.3 Usage Information
items: Platform usage analytics and interaction data
Chat conversations with our educational assistant
Learning progress and achievement data
Device information and browser type

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
items: To provide and maintain the Art3 Hub platform and services
To enable NFT creation, minting, and management functionality
To provide educational content and personalized learning experiences
To facilitate communication through our educational assistant
To connect you with opportunities in the digital art space
To improve our platform and develop new features
To ensure platform security and prevent fraud
To comply with legal obligations and blockchain requirements

blockchain.title: 4. Blockchain and Web3 Considerations
blockchain.content: Art3 Hub operates on blockchain networks including Base, Celo, and Zora. Important considerations:
items: Blockchain transactions are public and immutable by design
Your wallet address and NFT ownership are publicly visible on the blockchain
We cannot delete or modify information stored on the blockchain
Smart contract interactions may be visible to others
Gas fees and transaction costs are handled by the respective blockchain networks

sharing.title: 5. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We may share your information in the following circumstances:
items: Public Blockchain Data: NFT and transaction data is publicly available on blockchain networks
Service Providers: With trusted third-party services including Privy (authentication), Pinata (IPFS storage), and blockchain infrastructure providers
Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights and safety
Business Transfers: In connection with mergers, acquisitions, or asset sales
Educational Partners: Anonymized data with educational institutions and the Nounish Art School network

thirdParty.title: 6. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: Art3 Hub integrates with several third-party services:
items: Privy: For secure authentication and wallet connection
Pinata: For IPFS storage of NFT metadata and artwork
Blockchain Networks: Base, Celo, and Zora for NFT minting and transactions
Social Media Platforms: Google, Instagram, Twitter for social login
Analytics Services: For platform improvement and usage insights
thirdParty.note: Each third-party service has its own privacy policy. We encourage you to review their policies.

security.title: 7. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information:
items: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
Secure authentication through Privy
Regular security audits and updates
Limited access to personal information
Secure cloud infrastructure
security.disclaimer: However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security.

rights.title: 8. Your Rights and Choices
items: Access: Request access to your personal information
Correction: Request correction of inaccurate information
Deletion: Request deletion of your account and associated data (note: blockchain data cannot be deleted)
Portability: Request export of your data
Withdrawal: Withdraw consent for certain data processing activities
Account Control: Disconnect social media accounts and wallets

children.title: 9. Children's Privacy
children.content: Art3 Hub is designed for users 17 years and older. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 17. If we learn that we have collected information from a child under 17, we will take steps to delete such information promptly.

international.title: 10. International Data Transfers
international.content: Art3 Hub serves users globally, with a focus on the LATAM community. Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for such transfers.

changes.title: 11. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
contact.termsReference: For information about platform usage and user obligations, please also review our

privacyPolicy.footer: This Privacy Policy is effective as of {date} and applies to all users of the Art3 Hub platform.

items: Digital art creation and editing tools
NFT minting and management on Base, Celo, and Zora networks
Educational content and tutorials for digital art and blockchain technology

items: All blockchain transactions are final and irreversible
You are responsible for gas fees and transaction costs
NFT ownership is determined by blockchain records, not our platform
We do not guarantee the value or marketability of any NFTs
Blockchain networks may experience downtime or technical issues
Smart contract interactions carry inherent risks

prohibited.content: You agree not to use Art3 Hub for:
items: Illegal activities or violation of applicable laws
Harassment, abuse, or harmful conduct toward other users
Uploading content that infringes intellectual property rights
Creating or distributing malicious software or spam
Attempting to gain unauthorized access to our systems
Manipulating or gaming our platform features

We may modify, suspend, or discontinue services at any time
